kpi.name: M8015C1

kpi_info.title: Intra eNB HO attempts per neighbor cell
kpi_info.use: The number of Intra-eNB Handover attempts per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: This counter is updated when an RRC CONNECTION RECONFIGURATION message is sent by the eNB to the UE, indicating a Handover Command to the UE. This counter is updated in the source side of the handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Intra eNB HO attempts per neighbor cell
